body.name: ROVSUN 26lbs Compact Twin Tub Portable Washing Machine, Mini Washer(18lbs) & Spiner(8lbs) / Built-in Drain Pump/Semi-Automatic for Camping, Apartments, Dorms & RV’s (Grey)
features: 🛒【Large Capacity】You can operate washer or spinner separately, and you can also run two sides on the same time. The two tub design can meet your different needs. Total capacity:26lbs(washer:18lbs,spin cycle:8lbs), for doing light to medium laundry loads

🔄【Built-in Drain Pump】Built-in drain pump drains dirty water by more longer drainage tube from washer. Drainage tube dimensions: 56.3", more easier, suitable for most family. Easy storage and space saving design

⏱【Timer Control & Powerful Performance】Separate timer control for wash and spin operations. Wash timer for 15 min and spin timer for 5 minutes per load, You can set the time according to the amount of your clothes ,this unit features a 1300RPM powerful motor with a max frequency of 60Hz. Save your time and wash more clean

✅【Easy Operation】 Simple design of the operation panel, wash timing, wash options, drain options, and spin timing, more easier to use. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer and start washing, completely suitable for everywhere

👗【Washing Capacity & Specifications】Total capacity:26 lbs(washer:18 lbs, spin cycle:8 lbs). Overall dimensions: 27.4* 16.1* 31.9 inches. Power supply: 110v/60hz, Total power: 420w(wash:280w/dry:140w). Easy operation design and easily movable. We do cover 1-Year warranty on it

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ROVSUN 26LBS Semi-automatic Twin Tube Washing Machine A washing machine is common in each household. Today we are pleased to recommend this 26LBS Semi-automatic Twin Tube Washing Machine to you.This semi-automatic twin tube washing machine is an indispensable machine for your daily life. It can help you to wash dirty clothes quickly. With the first-grade stainless steel & plastic & PP material, it doesn't break your clothes during laundry. And it can keep your clothes as new! It is a very useful gadget for each household. Come to get one back home! Warm Notice: Before shipping the machine to our warehouse, we do have QC testing on it for ensuring that the washing machine is working fine, so sometimes, it would be a very little remaining water in it

Easy Operation Simple design of the operation panel, wash timer, wash selector, and spin timer, more easier to use. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer and start washing, completely suitable for everywhere! Built-in Drain Pump The ROVSUN potable washer features a BUILT-IN drain pump which effortlessly automatically drains water from the washer. 360°Rotation The 360° rotating design more efficiently washes your clothes and shortens the drying time. It is an essential assistant for your home and travel. Powerful Dual Motor Washing and spinning are all work by 1300RPM quality motor, with a max frequency of 60Hz. Powerful, fast, and work longer, what's more, it will make your clothes more cleaner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall I"m blown away!!!
reviews.reviewText: Update,I've done so many loads in it now I can't count. Still doing amazingly.. Love this machineOk, I love this washing machine and it works perfectly in our motorhome. I've done 4 loads so far.....I was amazed at the dirt it extracted. So, my last load was me taking clean clothes I laundered at the laundry mat. I rewashed them and I'll be damed, the water turned a decently dark shade of brown. Now, I rinsed the washer out completely after each load, so it wasn't the washer that made that load look dirty. So, I'm impressed.Pros:-Lightweight and very easy to use.-Washes very well, I'd say better than most full sized machines.-The spin dryer is amazing. The clothes come out barely damp and try incredibly fast.-Large enough to do a good amount of clothing in one load.-Line dried clothes after washing are soft and wrinkle free. Just make sure you rinse well and you're good!Cons:-The power cord is really short.-The hoses are really short and not the best quality.Overall, I'd recommend this washing machine to anyone needing one for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Washer
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my Daughters very small apartment. I is a great little machine, she has been using it for about 6 months now. It holds more than expected, does a though wash and spins the cloths almost dry. It is perfect for what she needs. It is light weight and easy to move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product of very low quality and not durable. Has a faulty drainage system
reviews.reviewText: product of very low quality and not durable. It has a faulty drainage system. The materials with which the washing machine is made are of very low quality, the plastic is weak and not resistant, it does not have a filter system to filter impurities from the clothes, the hoses are made of a very weak material that can be broken with ease when handling them even with great care when using them. It only has two speeds to wash clothes 1. normal and 2. delicate, it does not have a faster speed. The centrifuge lid does not fit the centrifuge cylinder and the plastic is extremely hard and not flexible so it can hurt your hands and break easily. It has a defective pump to drain the water, and the washing machine is not capable of draining the water by gravity. It is not worth it despite being cheapPlease I Need My money back I am not satisfied at all with this purshased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and so lightweight you can move it anywhere.
reviews.reviewText: After getting a few hand-me-down washing machines that either broke within a month or didn't work at all, we broke down and bought this because we can't afford a full sized washing machine. It was shipped beautifully and the set up could not have been easier! I use it several times a week with a family of 4 (plus animals). It gets our clothes clean EVERY TIME. Also super impressed with the spinner. It brings your clothes from sopping to slightly damp in seconds!! I would absolutely buy this again, it's a great product for the money you spend, and I tell all my friends and family that it's a great product! (They're quite sick of me talking about it, to be honest)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and effective
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It gets clothes clean, works with all kinds of detergent, and the spinner is surprisingly effective. Clothes come out mostly dry, especially synthetic materials. Cotton takes a bit longer to dry, but if you can get a fan on ‘em or some sun that’ll speed things up. I just put the clean clothes on hangers to dry. I’m usually not in a rush so waiting a few hours is no big deal.The only downside is the overall build quality seems ok-ish - who knows how long it will last. If I can get at least two years out of it I’ll consider it money well spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Things that make you go Hmmm
reviews.reviewText: I recently went from Samsungs HE front loader(3 years old, 1500$ set) to a lesser version of this machine (100$) I was impressed with the lesser version and I just wanted something a little bigger to knock out the Laundromat all together. For a lone stranger laundromats can be intimidating,gross, weird, and creepy. Also I don't want another -HE- style behemoth. So, obviously I settled on this one (not 100$-certainly not 1500$)The pump, amazing feature not equipped on the smaller version.The Swirlydoo , powerfully smooth.The Basin, Huge (Queen sized bedding- obviously no oversized comforters)The Salad Spinner, like a jet turbine.Overall size and weight, manageable for even the lesser average Joe or Joie. I am just over five and a half feet tall, and fresh out of a surgery that immobilized my left arm. I had little trouble getting it in the house, out of the box, set up, and operating all lone wolf style. I love, love, love this eco alternative to pretty much every other version I've tried to get my water to run clear. This machine is a Sleeper. Compact with a big bite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this little washer BUTMy first problem is the water input tubing doesn't fit my sink.Second. It leaves the dirt at the bottom of the machine like it doesn't fully clean out when it drains.Third. It doesn't fully drain the water when you drain clothes after the rinse cycle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purchase From Amazon
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough about this purchase.This has saved my life.It washes great. My clothes have come out cleaner, fresher, than ANY regular size washing machine. If you're unsure, undecided about this purchase, JUST BUY IT! You will not regret it. Another thing you won't regret, carrying all that laundry back & forth. Also having the convenience at hand in case of DIRTY Emergencies. Keep in mind that comforters can't be washed in this. I am able to wash 1 set of King size sheets at once. Also light weight blankets are a breeze. Jeans, Towels, etc. are also easy. Only do a few pair at a time and if the towels are large a few at a time. Those items are very heavy when wet, so the agitator will not work well when weighted down.The one thing that would make this nicer is a DING noise once the cycle is done. Not a deal breaker, just a thought.I hope this was a helpful review.
